title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: I build resilient and scalable backend services with Go. My expertise lies in solving complex problems in distributed systems, focusing on system architecture, performance, and delivering high-quality, reliable code.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: I develop systems that integrate with AWS and Azure marketplace APIs, schedule jobs, and run state transitions to automate the management of Private Offers for Red Hat customers.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: I built a multi-tenant business Rules Engine on Hyperledger Fabric, using Node.js to create secure REST APIs and a WebSocket handler for fast, safe rule evaluation.
